paper_abstract: In this paper, we consider the Barnes-type Narumi of the second kind and Poisson-Charlier mixed-type polynomials. We present several explicit formulas and recurrence relations for these polynomials. Also, we establish a connection between our polynomials and several known families of polynomials.
paper_title: BARNES-TYPE NARUMI OF THE SECOND KIND AND POISSON-CHARLIER MIXED-TYPE POLYNOMIALS
